content: {"locationId": "3915", "organizationId": "3361", "name": "Matthew 25:35 Ministries ", "address1": "1905 Ormond Blvd. ", "address2": "Serving from SCUMC, a partner organization", "city": "Destrehan", "state": "LA", "zipCode": "70047", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "29.9691868", "longitude": "-90.3775679", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  St Charles Parish", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "The mission of  Matthew 25:35 Ministries  is to alleviate hunger in St. Charles Parish by soliciting, collecting, and packaging food for distribution through a network of agencies and programs. We also want to alleviate hunger by education and connecting clients to other services that will help them become self-sufficient. We serve spiritual needs thru prayer, devotionals and other opportunities that are available to the clients and volunteers. Our services include food bag programs, congregate meals, and nutrition and educational services, social events, specialty distribution  and prayers from the prayer team. Our clients and volunteers become family!!", "notes": "Volunteers Welcome & Appreciated:        Monday - Chick- Fil-A bagging  2:00pm       Tuesday - Prep for Distribution & Make Bags 1 - 3pm       Wednesday - Unload Refrigeration Units 6 - 8am                          Bag and position items for distribution 7 - 8:30am                          Distribution 8am - Noon       Thursday - Chick-Fil-A bagging 9:15am  We also have opportunities for people to work from home or after hours, groups of volunteers, community service and more!!", "contactName": "Contact Volunteer", "contactPhone": "985-306-1067", "contactEmail": "matthew2535.contact@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 38, "regionName": "Second Harvest Food Bank Feeding South Louisiana", "logoBlobNameSmall": "e342973b-0cc0-4794-b3f9-080cdb5ba8df.png", "website": "https://no-hunger.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Wednesday 8:30 AM-10:30 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
